issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
1. base ui > views > scrollable view 
2. reload it a few times (back and forth to test list)

results: either a red screen with 
Sep  8 10:52:40 unknown KitchenSink[1085] <Error>: -[__NSArrayM context]: unrecognized selector sent to instance 0x5f20a0
Sep  8 10:52:40 unknown UIKitApplication:com.appcelerator.ks180[0xfad3][1085] <Notice>: [ERROR] Script Error = -[__NSArrayM context]: unrecognized selector sent to instance 0x5f20a0 at scroll_views_scrollable.js (line 5).


or it crashes
Sep  8 10:47:44 unknown com.apple.launchd[1] <Warning>: (UIKitApplication:com.appcelerator.ks180[0xf0d]) Job appears to have crashed: Segmentation fault: 11
Sep  8 10:47:44 unknown SpringBoard[15] <Warning>: Application 'KitchenSink' exited abnormally with signal 11: Segmentation fault: 11
fields.summary: iOS: Scrollable Views crash or red screen (unrecognized selector) after a few reloads
fields.environment: 1.8.0.bc5c585 (09/06/11 15:53), all supported ios devices. not seen in 1.7.2

comments.body:
Resolved.

Tested On:
Mac OSX Lion
TiMob: 1.8.0.v20110906155354
TiStud: 1.0.5.201109091616

Devices Used:
iPhone Simulator 4.3
iPod 3 version 4.0.2
iPhone 4 version 4.2.10
